CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): NA
E2B (R3): C.2.r.2.7 Reporter’s Telephone User Guidance: This data element captures the reporter's telephone number, including the country code and any extension. Numbers should be entered in a fashion that allows for international dialling (e.g. +cc) and not include any domestic trunk prefix. The phone number should not include domestic international dialing prefixes (also known as country exit codes, such as 00 in Europe, 011 in US, 010 in Japan).Begin with the International Telecommunications Union plus sign (+) notation followed by the country code appropriate for the location of the telephone number. Additional visual separators for human readability are not required. If used these characters should be limited to dashes ‘-‘ or dots ‘.’. Conformance: Optional Data Type: 33AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text, nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures the reporter's telephone number, including the country code and any extension. Numbers should be entered in a fashion that allows for international dialling (e.g. +cc) and not include any domestic trunk prefix.
CustomField.label: Phone
